homes_hear_details: Tennessee has not yet launched its HOMES or HEAR rebate programs under the Inflation Reduction Act. The Tennessee Department of Environment and Conservation (TDEC) - Office of Energy Programs is the designated state entity coordinating with the U.S. Department of Energy on program design.
state_energy_office: Tennessee Department of Environment and Conservation (TDEC) - Office of Energy Programs

income_thresholds.low_income_80_ami: For Tennessee, 80% of Area Median Income varies by county. In Davidson County (Nashville), 80% AMI for a family of four is approximately $64,750. In Shelby County (Memphis), it is approximately $56,200.
income_thresholds.moderate_income_150_ami: For Tennessee, 150% of Area Median Income varies by county. In Davidson County (Nashville), 150% AMI for a family of four is approximately $121,400. In Shelby County (Memphis), it is approximately $105,350.

net_metering: Tennessee does not have a statewide net metering mandate. The Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) sets distributed generation policies for its local power companies. TVA's current program offers credits for excess solar generation at a rate that varies but is generally below the retail rate.

state_rebate_programs.name: TVA EnergyRight Residential Services
state_rebate_programs.administrator: Tennessee Valley Authority (TVA) and local power companies
state_rebate_programs.amount: Up to $1,500 for qualifying heat pumps, $500 for insulation, $75 for smart thermostats
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Heat pumps, insulation, air sealing, duct sealing, ENERGY STAR appliances, smart thermostats
state_rebate_programs.details: TVA's EnergyRight program offers energy efficiency rebates through local power companies across Tennessee. Includes home energy evaluations and rebates for qualifying improvements.

state_rebate_programs.name: Weatherization Assistance Program
state_rebate_programs.amount: Average expenditure of approximately $7,000 per home
state_rebate_programs.eligible_items: Insulation, air sealing, heating system repair or replacement, windows, doors
state_rebate_programs.details: Federally funded program for income-qualifying households at or below 200% of federal poverty level. Administered through community action agencies and non-profit organizations.
